channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Publisher
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Publisher

item.title: CVE-2018-8245|2024-08-05T06:46:13.798Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20publisher
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Microsoft Publisher fails to utilize features that lock down the Local Machine zone when instantiating OLE objects, aka "Microsoft Publisher Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Publisher.
